structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COMMISSION AND CITY MANAGER FORMS OF GOVERNMENT (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 285, sec. 9. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 246, sec. 1, effective May 18, 1956. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3235dd-40, 3480c-41, 3606c-25.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Bonds of mayor, commissioners and employes.
